name: Squelette Chancelant
lang: understands all languages it spoke in life but can't speak

traits.name: Decrepit Weaponry
traits.desc: +3 to hit, 5ft., one target. Hit: 3 piercing damage.

traits.name: Dormant State
traits.desc: When you are in a dormant state you are indistinguishable from a mundane pile of bones.

traits.name: Opportunist
traits.desc: You roll with advantage when you make opportunity attacks.
